title: TeleCare Connect Platform Development
description: Develop a HIPAA-compliant telemedicine platform integrating real-time vital-sign data from home devices.

title: HIPAA Compliance
description: Ensure all data handling and storage comply with HIPAA regulations.

title: Implement Encryption for Data Transmissions
description: Ensure all data transmissions are encrypted using industry-standard protocols.

title: Implement Access Controls
description: Implement access controls to restrict data access to authorized personnel only.

title: Conduct Regular Audits
description: Conduct regular audits to ensure ongoing compliance with HIPAA regulations.

title: Certify Data Storage Solutions
description: Ensure data storage solutions are HIPAA-certified.

title: Real-time Vital-Sign Data Integration
description: Integrate data from home devices like blood pressure cuffs and pulse oximeters.

title: Integrate Data from Supported Home Devices
description: Ensure data from supported home devices is integrated in real-time.

title: Reflect Data Updates in Real-time
description: Ensure data updates are reflected in the platform within 5 seconds of measurement.

title: Support Integration with Home Medical Devices
description: Ensure the platform supports integration with at least five different home medical devices.

title: Ensure Secure Data Transmission
description: Ensure data transmission is secure and compliant with HIPAA regulations.

title: Custom Alerts for Clinicians
description: Allow clinicians to set custom alerts based on patient data trends.

title: Set Custom Alert Thresholds
description: Enable clinicians to set custom alert thresholds for each patient.

title: Trigger Alerts Based on Data Trends
description: Ensure alerts are triggered based on real-time data trends.

title: Deliver Alerts to Clinicians
description: Deliver alerts to clinicians via the platform and optional email/SMS notifications.

title: Log Alert History
description: Log and make alert history accessible for review.

title: Triage Functionality
description: Enable clinicians to triage patients based on incoming data trends.

title: View Patient List by Urgency
description: Enable clinicians to view a list of patients sorted by the urgency of their vital-sign data trends.

title: Provide Triage Recommendations
description: Provide recommendations for triage based on predefined criteria.

title: Manually Adjust Triage Priorities
description: Enable clinicians to manually adjust triage priorities as needed.

title: Log Triage History
description: Log and make triage history accessible for review.

title: Seamless Escalation to In-Person Care
description: Provide a smooth transition process from telemedicine to in-person care.

title: Escalate to In-Person Visits
description: Provide an option to escalate a patient's care to in-person visits.

title: Notify In-Person Care Team
description: Trigger a notification to the relevant in-person care team upon escalation.

title: Integrate with Scheduling Systems
description: Integrate with scheduling systems to book in-person appointments.

title: Log Escalation History
description: Log and make escalation history accessible for review.
